			  jQuery(".autocomplete").autocomplete({
				source: searchTags,
				minLength: 3,

					document.getElementById('search_query').value = ui.item.value;

		 ',   ', u" 
			<!-- Move top navibar of school page 30px down if the language notification on top appears + event when closing notification -->
			// triggered when navibar is affixed
			jQuery(document).on('affixed.bs.affix', '#content_list', navibarCorrection);
			
			// triggered when navibar isn't affixed
			jQuery(document).on('affixed-top.bs.affix', '#content_list', navibarCorrectionOut);
			
			// triggered when closing language notification
			jQuery(document).on('click', '.suggestion_close', navibarCorrectionCloseOut);

			// executed when navibar is affixed
			function navibarCorrection() {
				var show_lang_suggestion = document.getElementById('show_lang_suggestion').value;
				var cookie_value = readCookie('lang_suggest_close');
				// check if notification is opened
				if ( (cookie_value == null || parseInt(cookie_value) < 2) && show_lang_suggestion == 'true' ) {
					// if notification is opened then put a margin-top to the navibar to avoid hiding it behind notification
					jQuery('#content_list').css('margin-top', '30px');
				}
			}
			
			// executed when navibar isn't affixed
			function navibarCorrectionOut() {
				var show_lang_suggestion = document.getElementById('show_lang_suggestion').value;
				var cookie_value = readCookie('lang_suggest_close');
				// check if the language notification is opened and remove the margin-top
				if ( (cookie_value == null || parseInt(cookie_value) < 2) && show_lang_suggestion == 'true' ) {
					jQuery('#content_list').css('margin-top', '0');
				}
			}
			
			// executed when closing language notification
			function navibarCorrectionCloseOut() {
				// changing value of notification to false
				jQuery('#show_lang_suggestion').attr('value', 'false');
				// closing notification
				jQuery('#content_list').css('margin-top', '0');
			}
		 ",  ',

', u"
					imagenFactura = new Image();
		imagenFactura.src = 'http://c0577872.cdn.cloudfiles.rackspacecloud.com/brochures_box_bgk.gif';
		imagenFotos = new Image();
	imagenFotos.src = 'http://c0577872.cdn.cloudfiles.rackspacecloud.com/fotos_box_bgk.gif';
",

	  	function MM_findObj(n, d) {  //v4.01
  		var p,i,x;  if(!d) d=document; if((p=n.indexOf("?"))>0&&parent.frames.length) {
    	d=parent.frames[n.substring(p+1)].document; n=n.substring(0,p);}
  		if(!(x=d[n])&&d.all) x=d.all[n]; for (i=0;!x&&i<d.forms.length;i++) x=d.forms[i][n];
  		for(i=0;!x&&d.layers&&i<d.layers.length;i++) x=MM_findObj(n,d.layers[i].document);
  		if(!x && d.getElementById) x=d.getElementById(n); return x;
	}
	
	function showHideLayers() { 
  	var i,p,v,obj,args=showHideLayers.arguments;
  	for (i=0; i<(args.length-2); i+=3) 
  		if ((obj=MM_findObj(args[i]))!=null) {
  			v=args[i+2];
	    	if (obj.style) {
	    		obj=obj.style; v=(v=='show')?'visible':(v=='hide')?'hidden':v; 
	    	}
    		obj.visibility=v; 
    	}
	}

	function isEmailAddress( value ) {
		var filter=/^[a-zA-Z0-9._-]+([+][a-zA-Z0-9._-]+){0,1}[@][a-zA-Z0-9._-]+[.][a-zA-Z]{2,6}$/;
		if ( value.length == 0 ) return true;
		return !filter.test( value );
	}

	function validate_basic_applic(frm)	 {
	  var value = '';
	  var errFlag = new Array();
	  var flag = '';
	  _Msg = '';	  

	  var course_id = document.getElementById( "id_course" ).value;
	  if (course_id == ""){
		    errFlag['course'] = true;
		    _Msg = _Msg + '\n - ' + js_process_string('Please select a course');
	  }

      value = document.applicationform.elements['number_weeks'].value;
      if (course_id != -1 && value == '>>>' && !errFlag['number_weeks']) {
	    errFlag['number_weeks'] = true;
	    flag = 'number_weeks';
	    _Msg = _Msg + '\n - ' + js_process_string('The number of weeks is a required field. Please try again.');
	  }
          
      var private_lessons = document.applicationform.elements['indiv_lesson'].value;

      if (course_id == -1 && private_lessons < 1) {
		errFlag['private_lessons'] = true;
		flag = 'indiv_lesson';
		_Msg = _Msg + '\n - ' + js_process_string('Please select number of private lessons.');
      }

	  value = document.getElementById('firstname').value;
	  if (value == '' && value.length < 2 && !errFlag['firstname']) {
		    errFlag['firstname'] = true;
		    flag = 'firstname';
		    _Msg = _Msg + '\n - ' + js_process_string('Your name is a required field. Please try again.');
	  }

	  value = document.getElementById('lastname').value;
	  if (value == '' && value.length < 2 && !errFlag['lastname']) {
		    errFlag['lastname'] = true;
		    flag = 'lastname';
		    _Msg = _Msg + '\n - ' + js_process_string('Your last name is a required field. Please try again.');
	  }

	  value = document.getElementById('email').value;
	  if ( isEmailAddress( value ) && !errFlag['email']) {
		    errFlag['email'] = true;
		    flag = 'email';
		    _Msg = _Msg + '\n - ' + js_process_string('Your email is a required field. Please try again.');
	  }

	  if (_Msg != '') {
		    _Msg = _Msg + '\n';
		    alert(_Msg);
		    frm.elements[flag].focus();
		    return false;
	  }
	  	  		submitValue = checkAvailability(frm);
	  		return submitValue;	  
  	  
	}

  	function validate_applic(frm) {
	  var value = '';
	  var errFlag = new Array();
	  var flag = 'cityapplic';
	  _Msg = '';
	  var document = this.parent.document;	  
	 
	  var course_id = document.getElementById("id_course").value;
	  if (course_id == ""){
		    errFlag['course'] = true;
		    _Msg = _Msg + '\n - ' + js_process_string('Please select a course');
	  }
	  
	  value = document.getElementById('cityapplic').value;
	  if (value == '' && !errFlag['cityapplic']) {
		    errFlag['cityapplic'] = true;
		    flag = 'cityapplic';
		    _Msg = _Msg + '\n - ' + js_process_string('Please enter a city name.');
	  }
          
          value = document.applicationform.elements['number_weeks'].value;
          if (course_id != -1 && value == '>>>' && !errFlag['number_weeks']) {
		    errFlag['number_weeks'] = true;
		    flag = 'number_weeks';
		    _Msg = _Msg + '\n - ' + js_process_string('The number of weeks is a required field. Please try again.');
	  }
          
      var private_lessons = document.applicationform.elements['indiv_lesson'].value;

      if (course_id == -1 && private_lessons < 1) {
		errFlag['private_lessons'] = true;
		flag = 'indiv_lesson';
		_Msg = _Msg + '\n - ' + js_process_string('Please select number of private lessons.');
      }

	  value = document.getElementById('firstname').value;
	  if (value == '' && value.length < 2 && !errFlag['firstname']) {
		    errFlag['firstname'] = true;
		    flag = 'firstname';
		    _Msg = _Msg + '\n - ' + js_process_string('Your name is a required field. Please try again.');
	  }

	  value = document.getElementById('lastname').value;
	  if (value == '' && value.length < 2 && !errFlag['lastname']) {
		    errFlag['lastname'] = true;
		    flag = 'lastname';
		    _Msg = _Msg + '\n - ' + js_process_string('Your last name is a required field. Please try again.');
	  }

	  value = document.getElementById('mailing_address').value;
	  if (value == '' && value.length < 5 && !errFlag['mailing_address']) {
		    errFlag['mailing_address'] = true;
		    flag = 'mailing_address';
		    _Msg = _Msg + '\n - ' + js_process_string('Your address is a required field. Please try again.');
	  }

	  value = document.getElementById('country_id').value;
	  if (value == 0 && !errFlag['country_id']) {
		    errFlag['country_id'] = true;
		    flag = 'country_id';
		    _Msg = _Msg + '\n - ' + js_process_string('Your country is a required field. Please try again.');
	  }
	  
	  

//	  value = document.getElementById('passport_no').value;
//	  if (value == '' && value.length < 5 && !errFlag['passport_no']) {
//		    errFlag['passport_no'] = true;
//		    flag = 'passport_no';
//		    _Msg = _Msg + '\n - ' + js_process_string('Please write this information using latin characters, as in your passport. It is necessary for the visa!');
//	  }

	  value = document.getElementById('nationality').value;
	  if (value == 0 && !errFlag['nationality']) {
		    errFlag['nationality'] = true;
		    flag = 'nationality';
		    _Msg = _Msg + '\n - ' + js_process_string('Please enter your nationality.');
	  }
	  
	  value = document.getElementById('email').value;
	  if ( isEmailAddress( value ) && !errFlag['email']) {
		    errFlag['email'] = true;
		    flag = 'email';
		    _Msg = _Msg + '\n - ' + js_process_string('Your email is a required field. Please try again.');
	  }

	  if  (!document.getElementById('insuranceConditions').checked && 
	  	(document.getElementById('insurance_type').value == "health" || document.getElementById('insurance_type').value == "cancellation")) {
	  		errFlag['insuranceConditions'] = true;
	  		flag = 'insuranceConditions';
	  		_Msg = _Msg + '\n - ' + js_process_string('For contracting insurance you need to click on the checkbox to agree with the terms and conditions of the insurance');
	  }


	  fieldNameArray = {
	  	 'firstname': 'first name:',
	  	 'lastname' : 'last name',
	  	 'company_name': 'company\'s name',
	  	 'mailing_address' : 'address',
	  	 'cityapplic' : 'city',
	  	 'zip' : 'zip',
	  	 'home_phone' : 'phone',
	  	 'work_phone' : 'phone (cell phone / private)',
	  	 'fax' : 'fax number',
	  	 'emergency_contact_phone' : 'phone',
	  	 'airline' : 'airport', 
	  	 'flight_number' : 'flight no.',
	  	 'companion_name' : 'name of companions',
	  	 'anything_else' : '',
	  	 'referer' : 'where did you hear about us?',
	  	 'comments' : 'comments'
	  };

	  notUrlAllowedMessages = {
	  	 'es' : 'No se acepta ninguna url en el campo FIELDNAME',
	  	 'en' : 'Url not allowed in the FIELDNAME field',
	  	 'nl' : 'Geen URL is mogelijk in het FIELDNAME veld',
	 	 'fr' : 'Aucune adresse internet n\'est autoris\ufffde dans l\'emplacement FIELDNAME',
	  	 'se' : 'Ej till\ufffdtet med URL-adress i FIELDNAME f\ufffdltet',
	  	 'jp' : 'Not allowed urls in the FIELDNAME field',
	  	 'r : 'Not allowed urls in the FIELDNAME field',
	  	 'it' : 'Not allowed urls in the FIELDNAME field',
	  	 'pl' : 'Not allowed urls in the FIELDNAME field',
	  	 'ge' : 'Not allowed urls in the FIELDNAME field'
	  };
	  
	  for (fieldName in fieldNameArray) {
	  	str = document.getElementById(fieldName).value;
	  	str = str.toLowerCase(str); 
	  	if (str.indexOf("http://") >=0 ) {
		    errorUrlMessage = notUrlAllowedMessages['en']; 
		    errorUrlMessage = errorUrlMessage.replace(/FIELDNAME/, fieldNameArray[fieldName]); 
		    _Msg = _Msg + '\n - ' + errorUrlMessage;
	  	}
	  }
	  
	  var package_id = getPackageId();
	  var checked_sex = document.getElementById('sex').value != "";

	  if (package_id > 0 && packages[package_id].places < 0 && !checked_sex) {
	  	_Msg = _Msg + '\n - ' + 'Debe especificar su sexo para reservar plaza en un paquete.';
	  }
	  
	  if (_Msg != '') {
		    _Msg = _Msg + '\n';
		    alert(_Msg);
		    frm.elements[flag].focus();
		    return false;
	  }
	  	  		submitValue = checkAvailability(frm);
	  		return submitValue;	  
  	    	}

	function validate_and_change(frm) {
		var ret = validate_basic_applic(frm);
		if ( ret ) {
			var id = document.getElementById( "id_course" ).value;
			var lang_id = parseInt( id.toString().substr( 0, id.toString().length - 5 ), 10 );
			var course_id = parseInt( id.toString().substr( id.toString().length - 5 ), 10 );
			document.getElementById( "id_course" ).value= course_id;
			document.getElementById( "course_language_id" ).value = lang_id;
		}
		return ret; 
	}
	
	function openCalcPopup(string_datetime) {
		if ( document.getElementById( 'flight_details' ).selectedIndex != 0 ) {
			cal_arrival.popup(string_datetime);
		}
		return false;
	}
		function monthName(monthNumber) {
	var monthNames = new Array();	
	monthNames[0] = 'January';
	monthNames[1] = 'February';
	monthNames[2] = 'March';
	monthNames[3] = 'April';
	monthNames[4] = 'May';
	monthNames[5] = 'June';
	monthNames[6] = 'July';
	monthNames[7] = 'August';
	monthNames[8] = 'September';
	monthNames[9] = 'October';
	monthNames[10] = 'November';
	monthNames[11] = 'December';
	return monthNames[monthNumber-1];
}
function checkAvailability(frm) {
	// Get the chosen course and dates
	var doc = frm;
	// courseId = doc.elements['id_course'].options[doc.elements['id_course'].selectedIndex].value;
	// courseName = doc.elements['id_course'].options[doc.elements['id_course'].selectedIndex].text;
	includes_accommodation = document.getElementById("includes_accommodation").value;
	courseId = document.getElementById("id_course").value;
	courseName = document.getElementById( "id_course_selector" ).innerHTML;
	accommodationId = doc.elements['accomodation_type_description'].options[doc.elements['accomodation_type_description'].selectedIndex].value;
	accommodationName = doc.elements['accomodation_type_description'].options[doc.elements['accomodation_type_description'].selectedIndex].text;
	// Initial dates and duration for course
	var start_year = Number(doc.elements['start_year'].value);
	var start_month = doc.elements['start_month'].value;
	var start_day = doc.elements['start_day'].value;	
	var duration = doc.elements['number_weeks'].value;
	
	// Calculation of final day for course 
	var finishDate = new Date();
	finishDate.setMonth(start_month-1, start_day);
	finishDate.setYear(start_year);
	
	// Duration of course in milliseconds
	finishTmstmp = 1000 * 3600 * 24 * (7 * duration - 1);
	finishTmstmp += finishDate.valueOf(); 	
	var finishDate = new Date();
	finishDate.setTime(finishTmstmp);
	var finish_year = Number(finishDate.getFullYear());
	var finish_month = Number(finishDate.getMonth())+1 ;
	var finish_day = Number(finishDate.getDate());
	yearArray = new Array(2017, 2018);
	langArray = new Array('en');

	// Course availability variables
courseArray = new Array(  15153 ,	  14964 ,	  20390 ,	  14968 ,	  14969 ,	  15159 ,	  14965 ,	  14967 ,	  22004   );
	courseAv = new Array(Array);
			courseAv[0] = new Array(2);
		courseAv[0][0] = new Array(1);
		courseAv[0][0][0] = '';
		courseAv[0][1] = new Array(1);
		courseAv[0][1][0] = '';
			courseAv[1] = new Array(2);
		courseAv[1][0] = new Array(1);
		courseAv[1][0][0] = '';
		courseAv[1][1] = new Array(1);
		courseAv[1][1][0] = '';
			courseAv[2] = new Array(2);
		courseAv[2][0] = new Array(1);
		courseAv[2][0][0] = '';
		courseAv[2][1] = new Array(1);
		courseAv[2][1][0] = '';
			courseAv[3] = new Array(2);
		courseAv[3][0] = new Array(1);
		courseAv[3][0][0] = '';
		courseAv[3][1] = new Array(1);
		courseAv[3][1][0] = '';
			courseAv[4] = new Array(2);
		courseAv[4][0] = new Array(1);
		courseAv[4][0][0] = '';
		courseAv[4][1] = new Array(1);
		courseAv[4][1][0] = '';
			courseAv[5] = new Array(2);
		courseAv[5][0] = new Array(1);
		courseAv[5][0][0] = '';
		courseAv[5][1] = new Array(1);
		courseAv[5][1][0] = '';
			courseAv[6] = new Array(2);
		courseAv[6][0] = new Array(1);
		courseAv[6][0][0] = '';
		courseAv[6][1] = new Array(1);
		courseAv[6][1][0] = '';
			courseAv[7] = new Array(2);
		courseAv[7][0] = new Array(1);
		courseAv[7][0][0] = '';
		courseAv[7][1] = new Array(1);
		courseAv[7][1][0] = '';
			courseAv[8] = new Array(2);
		courseAv[8][0] = new Array(1);
		courseAv[8][0][0] = '';
		courseAv[8][1] = new Array(1);
		courseAv[8][1][0] = '';
	

	// Accommodation dates
	var accommo_start_year = Number(doc.elements['first_year'].value);
	var accommo_start_month = doc.elements['first_month'].value;
	var accommo_start_day = doc.elements['first_day'].value;
	var accommo_finish_year = Number(doc.elements['last_year'].value);
	var accommo_finish_month = doc.elements['last_month'].value;
	var accommo_finish_day = doc.elements['last_day'].value;

	// Accommo availability variables
	accommodationArray = new Array(
			7110
		, 			7113
		, 			8604
		, 			9181
		, 			9182
		, 			9183
		, 			9184
				);

	accommodationAv = new Array(Array);
			accommodationAv[0] = new Array(2);
		accommodationAv[0][0] = new Array(1);
		accommodationAv[0][0][0] = '';
		accommodationAv[0][1] = new Array(1);
		accommodationAv[0][1][0] = '';
			accommodationAv[1] = new Array(2);
		accommodationAv[1][0] = new Array(1);
		accommodationAv[1][0][0] = '';
		accommodationAv[1][1] = new Array(1);
		accommodationAv[1][1][0] = '';
			accommodationAv[2] = new Array(2);
		accommodationAv[2][0] = new Array(1);
		accommodationAv[2][0][0] = '';
		accommodationAv[2][1] = new Array(1);
		accommodationAv[2][1][0] = '';
			accommodationAv[3] = new Array(2);
		accommodationAv[3][0] = new Array(1);
		accommodationAv[3][0][0] = '';
		accommodationAv[3][1] = new Array(1);
		accommodationAv[3][1][0] = '';
			accommodationAv[4] = new Array(2);
		accommodationAv[4][0] = new Array(1);
		accommodationAv[4][0][0] = '';
		accommodationAv[4][1] = new Array(1);
		accommodationAv[4][1][0] = '';
			accommodationAv[5] = new Array(2);
		accommodationAv[5][0] = new Array(1);
		accommodationAv[5][0][0] = '';
		accommodationAv[5][1] = new Array(1);
		accommodationAv[5][1][0] = '';
			accommodationAv[6] = new Array(2);
		accommodationAv[6][0] = new Array(1);
		accommodationAv[6][0][0] = '';
		accommodationAv[6][1] = new Array(1);
		accommodationAv[6][1][0] = '';
	
	var submit = true;
	var errorMsg = "";

    flightDetails = false; /*Boolean(parseInt(document.getElementById('flight_details').options[document.getElementById('flight_details').selectedIndex].value));*/
    if (flightDetails) {
        arrival_day = document.getElementById('arrival_day').options[document.getElementById('arrival_day').selectedIndex].value;
        arrival_month = document.getElementById('arrival_month').options[document.getElementById('arrival_month').selectedIndex].value;
        arrival_year = document.getElementById('arrival_year').options[document.getElementById('arrival_year').selectedIndex].value;
        if (isNotValidDate(arrival_day, arrival_month, arrival_year)) {
			errorMsg = js_process_string("Arrival date ") + arrival_day + "." + js_process_string(monthName(arrival_month)) + "." + arrival_year + js_process_string(" is not a valid date. ");
			submit = false;
        }
        else if(checkDateIsPast(arrival_day, arrival_month, arrival_year)) {
            	errorMsg += js_process_string("\nArrival date ") + arrival_day + "." + js_process_string(monthName(arrival_month)) + "." + arrival_year + js_process_string(" is a past date ");
            	submit = false;
        }
    }

    // Check dates are valid
    if (isNotValidDate(start_day, start_month, start_year)) {
		errorMsg += js_process_string("\nStarting date ") + start_day + "." + js_process_string(monthName(start_month)) + "." + start_year + js_process_string(" is not a valid date. ");
		submit = false;
    }
	// Check dates are not in the past
    else if(checkDateIsPast(start_day, start_month, start_year)) {
		errorMsg += js_process_string("\nStarting date ") + start_day + "." + js_process_string(monthName(start_month)) + "." + start_year + js_process_string(" is a past date ");
		submit = false;
	}

    if(includes_accommodation == 0) {
            // Check dates are valid
            if (accommodationId > 0 && isNotValidDate(accommo_start_day, accommo_start_month, accommo_start_year)) {
                errorMsg += js_process_string("\nCheck-in date ") + accommo_start_day + "." + js_process_string(monthName(accommo_start_month)) + "." + accommo_start_year + js_process_string(" is not a valid date. ");
                submit = false;
            }
            // Check dates are not in the past
			else if(accommodationId > 0 && checkDateIsPast(accommo_start_day, accommo_start_month, accommo_start_year)) {
                errorMsg += js_process_string("\nCheck-in date ") + accommo_start_day + "." + js_process_string(monthName(accommo_start_month)) + "." + accommo_start_year + js_process_string(" is a past date ");
                submit = false;
			}
            // Check dates are valid
            if (accommodationId > 0 && isNotValidDate(accommo_finish_day, accommo_finish_month, accommo_finish_year)) {
                errorMsg += js_process_string("\nCheck-out date ") + accommo_finish_day + "." + js_process_string(monthName(accommo_finish_month)) + "." + accommo_finish_year + js_process_string(" is not a valid date. ");
                submit = false;
            }
            // Check dates are not in the past
			else if(accommodationId > 0 && checkDateIsPast(accommo_finish_day, accommo_finish_month, accommo_finish_year)) {
                errorMsg += js_process_string("\nCheck-out date ") + accommo_finish_day + "." + js_process_string(monthName(accommo_finish_month)) + "." + accommo_finish_year + js_process_string(" is a past date. ");
                submit = false;
			}
		// Check starting dates are not after ending dates if no other errors are present  
		if (errorMsg == '' && accommodationId > 0 && !validInterval(accommo_start_day, accommo_start_month, accommo_start_year, accommo_finish_day, accommo_finish_month, accommo_finish_year)) {
			errorMsg += js_process_string("\nCheck-out date ") + accommo_finish_day + "." + js_process_string(monthName(accommo_finish_month)) + "." + accommo_finish_year + js_process_string(" is not a valid date ") + js_process_string(" Date is previous to  check-in date ");
			submit = false;
		}
	}

	if(errorMsg != '') {
		alert(errorMsg);
	}

	// Check no course dates. Course id is the modulo after dividing by 100000. The 100000ths indicate the lang  
	errorMsg = checkCourseAvailability(courseId%100000, start_year, start_month, start_day, finish_year, 
	 finish_month, finish_day, courseArray, yearArray, langArray, courseAv); 	
	if(errorMsg != '') {
		alert(courseName + js_process_string(" not available on the following dates :\n") + errorMsg);
		submit = false;
	}
	// Check no accomodation dates
	errorMsg = checkCourseAvailability(accommodationId, accommo_start_year, accommo_start_month, accommo_start_day, 
		accommo_finish_year, accommo_finish_month, accommo_finish_day, accommodationArray, yearArray, 
		langArray, accommodationAv);
	if(errorMsg != '') {
		alert(accommodationName + js_process_string(" not available on the following dates :\n") + errorMsg);
		submit = false;
	}
	return submit;

}

function checkDateIsPast (day, month, year) {	
 	var nowDate = new Date();
	var checkedDate = new Date();
	checkedDate.setMonth(month-1, day);
	checkedDate.setYear(year);
	return nowDate.valueOf() >= checkedDate.valueOf();
}

//***********************************************************************************************
// isNotValidDate(day, month, year)
//
// Valida que el día y el mes introducidos sean correctos. Además valida que el año introducido
// sea o no bisiesto
//
//***********************************************************************************************
function isNotValidDate(dia,mes,anio)
{
    var elMes = parseInt(mes);

    if(elMes>12)
        return 1;
    // MES FEBRERO
    if(elMes == 2){
        if(esBisiesto(anio)){
            if(parseInt(dia) > 29){
                return 1;
            }
            else
            return 0;
        }
        else{
            if(parseInt(dia) > 28){
                return 1;
            }
            else
                return 0;
        }
    }
    //RESTO DE MESES

    if(elMes== 4 || elMes==6 || elMes==9 || elMes==11){
        if(parseInt(dia) > 30){
            return 1;
        }
    }
    return 0;

}
//*****************************************************************************************
// esBisiesto(anio)
//
// Determina si el año pasado com parámetro es o no bisiesto
//*****************************************************************************************
function esBisiesto(anio)
{
    var BISIESTO;
    if(parseInt(anio)%4==0){
        if(parseInt(anio)%100==0){
            if(parseInt(anio)%400==0){
                BISIESTO=true;
            }
            else{
                BISIESTO=false;
            }
        }
        else{
            BISIESTO=true;
        }
    }
    else
        BISIESTO=false;

    return BISIESTO;
}

function validInterval(firstDay, firstMonth, firstYear, secondDay, secondMonth, secondYear) {
	var firstDate = new Date();
	firstDate.setMonth(firstMonth-1, firstDay);
	firstDate.setYear(firstYear);
	var secondDate = new Date();
	secondDate.setMonth(secondMonth-1, secondDay);
	secondDate.setYear(secondYear);	
	return secondDate.valueOf() > firstDate.valueOf();
}
function checkCourseAvailability(courseId, start_year, start_month, start_day, finish_year,
	 finish_month, finish_day, courseArray, yearArray, langArray, courseAv){	
	
	var errorMsg = "";
	var startDate = new Date();
	startDate.setMonth(start_month-1, start_day);
	startDate.setYear(start_year);
	startTmstmp = startDate.valueOf();	
	var finishDate = new Date();
	finishDate.setMonth(finish_month-1, finish_day);
	finishDate.setYear(finish_year);
	finishTmstmp = finishDate.valueOf();
		
	// look for the course in the array
	courseIndex =-1;
	i = 0;
	while(i < courseArray.length && courseIndex == -1) {
		if (courseArray[i] == courseId) {
			courseIndex = i;	
		}
		i++;	
	}		
	avError = false;	
	if (courseId>0 && courseIndex >= 0) {
		// look for the year in the array
		yearIndex =-1;
		i = 0;
		while(i < yearArray.length && yearIndex == -1) {
			if (yearArray[i] == start_year) {
				yearIndex = i;	
			}
			i++;	
		}
		if (start_year>0 && yearIndex >= 0) {
			// Get the chosen language

			var lang = 'en' ;

			// look for the language in the array
			langIndex =-1;
			i = 0;
			while(i < langArray.length && langIndex == -1) {
				if (langArray[i] == lang) {
					langIndex = i;
				}	
			}
			i++;
			if(langIndex >= 0) {
				avRule = courseAv[courseIndex][yearIndex][langIndex];				
				if(avRule.length > 0) {
					// separate rules
					var simpleRules = new Array();
					var ruleDates = new Array();					
					var avStartDate = new Date();
					var avFinishDate = new Date();
					simpleRules = avRule.split(',');					
					for (i=0; i < simpleRules.length; i++) {
						ruleDates = simpleRules[i].split('-');
						avFirstMonth = ruleDates[0].substr(3, 5);
						avFirstDay = ruleDates[0].substr(0, 2);
						avLastMonth = ruleDates[1].substr(3, 5);
						avLastDay = ruleDates[1].substr(0, 2);

						// start day must not be between non availability period
						avStartDate.setMonth(ruleDates[0].substr(3, 5)-1);
						avStartDate.setDate(ruleDates[0].substr(0, 2));
						avStartDate.setYear(start_year);
						avStartTmstmp = avStartDate.valueOf();
						avFinishDate.setMonth(ruleDates[1].substr(3, 5)-1);
						avFinishDate.setDate(ruleDates[1].substr(0, 2));						
						avFinishDate.setYear(start_year);
						avFinishTmstmp = avFinishDate.valueOf();
						errorMsg += avStartDate.getDate() + "\\" + Number(avStartDate.getMonth()+1) + "\\" + avStartDate.getFullYear() + 
							" - " + avFinishDate.getDate() + "\\" + Number(avFinishDate.getMonth()+1) + "\\" + avFinishDate.getFullYear() + "\n";
						if(avStartTmstmp <= startTmstmp && startTmstmp <= avFinishTmstmp) {
							avError = true;
						}
						// If finish date is in the same year as the start date we compare here
						if (finish_year == start_year && (avStartTmstmp <= finishTmstmp 
							&& finishTmstmp <= avFinishTmstmp)) {
							avError = true;
						}

						if (finish_year == start_year && (startTmstmp <= avStartTmstmp 
							&& avFinishTmstmp <= finishTmstmp)) {
							avError = true;
						}
					}
					// We make a clever guess assumption now: Next year will be in next index
					if (finish_year == start_year + 1) {
						avRule = courseAv[courseIndex][yearIndex+1][langIndex];				
						if(avRule.length > 0) {
							// separate rules
							var simpleRules = new Array();
							var ruleDates = new Array();
							var avStartDate = new Date();
							var avFinishDate = new Date();
							simpleRules = avRule.split(',');					
							for (i=0; i<simpleRules.length; i++) {
								ruleDates = simpleRules[i].split('-');
								avFirstMonth = ruleDates[0].substr(3, 5);
								avFirstDay = ruleDates[0].substr(0, 2);
								avLastMonth = ruleDates[1].substr(3, 5);
								avLastDay = ruleDates[1].substr(0, 2);
								// start day must not be between non availability period
								avStartDate.setMonth(ruleDates[0].substr(3, 5)-1);
								avStartDate.setDate(ruleDates[0].substr(0, 2));								
								avStartDate.setYear(finish_year);
								avStartTmstmp = avStartDate.valueOf();
								avFinishDate.setMonth(ruleDates[1].substr(3, 5)-1);
								avFinishDate.setDate(ruleDates[1].substr(0, 2));
								avFinishDate.setYear(finish_year);
								avFinishTmstmp = avFinishDate.valueOf();
								errorMsg += avStartDate.getDate() + "\\" + Number(avStartDate.getMonth()+1) + "\\" + avStartDate.getFullYear() + 
							" - " + avFinishDate.getDate() + "\\" + Number(avFinishDate.getMonth()+1) + "\\" + avFinishDate.getFullYear() + "\n";
								if(finishTmstmp >= avStartTmstmp) {
									// Since the first date in the chosen interval is from the year
									// before, any forbidden period before the second date of the 
									// interval makes a forbidden booking 
									avError = true;
								}
							}
						} // If exists rule	
					} // End of finish_year == start_year + 1
				} // End if no blank rule
			} // End if we have found the language
		} // End of start_year >0
	} // End of CourseId >0
	
	if (avError) {
		return(errorMsg);
	} else {
		return "";
	}
}
', 
', 
  ',  
		function getUrlParameter(sParam) {
			var sPageURL = decodeURIComponent(window.location.search.substring(1)),
				sURLVariables = sPageURL.split('&'),
				sParameterName,
				i;

			for (i = 0; i < sURLVariables.length; i++) {
				sParameterName = sURLVariables[i].split('=');

				if (sParameterName[0] === sParam) {
					return sParameterName[1] === undefined ? '' : sParameterName[1];
				}
			}
		}

		function checkPoint2Course() {
			var id = getUrlParameter('cid');

			if (id != undefined && id != '') {
				if (jQuery('#dataCourse' + id).hasClass('collapse')) {
					jQuery('[aria-controls="dataCourse' + id + '"].caratDropDown').click();
				}
				jQuery('html,body').animate({scrollTop: jQuery('#dataCourse'+id).offset().top - 140});
			}
		}

		/*function showAllCourses() {
			$$( 'span._showHideCourses' ).each( function( el ) {
				var id = 'dataCourse' + el.getProperty( "id" );
				var cmp = document.getElementById( id ).className;
				if ( cmp == 'hide_row' ) {
					toggle( id );
				}
			});
		}*/

		/*function showAllAccommodations() {
			$$( 'span._showHideAccommodations' ).each( function( el ) {
				var id = 'dataAccommodation' + el.getProperty( "id" );
				var cmp = document.getElementById( id ).className;

				if ( cmp == 'hide_row' ) {
					toggle( id );
				}
			});
		}*/
	 ',  ',  //Force scroll visibility in mobile FF (& mozilla based mobile browsers): http://stackoverflow.com/questions/18317634/force-visible-scrollbar-in-firefox-on-mac-os-x#28835963  
		var sc;
		jQuery(document).ready(function(){
			//constantly update the scroll position:
			sc=setInterval(scrollDown,200);

			//optional:stop the updating if it gets a click
			jQuery('.forceScrollVisibility').mousedown(function(e){
				clearInterval(sc);            
			});
		});
		function scrollDown(){
			//find every div with class "forceScrollVisibility" and apply the fix
			for(i=0;i<=jQuery('.forceScrollVisibility').length;i++){
				try{
					var g=jQuery('.forceScrollVisibility')[i];
					g.scrollTop+=1;
					g.scrollTop-=1;
				} catch(e){
					//eliminates errors when no scroll is needed
				}
			}
		}

	 ',  ', Beginner(A1): ', No knowledge or understand only few basic words/phrases',  ', Elementary(A2): ', Can understand and speak about simple topics: i.e. family, shopping, hobby.',  ', Lower Intermediate(B1): ', Can speak about future and past events, give reasons and explanations for a situation.',  ', Upper Intermediate(B2): ', Can speak about abstract topics, produce clear, detailed text on many subjects.',  ', Advanced(C1): ', Can use language flexibly and effectively.',  ', Proficiency(C2): ', Can express himself/herself spontaneously, very fluently and precisely.',  ',  ',  
		// Para que el scrolleado del menú fixed no caiga por encima de los títulos de las secciones y sea animado => https://jsfiddle.net/ianclark001/aShQL/
		function scroll_if_anchor(href) {
			href = typeof(href) == "string" ? href : jQuery(this).attr("href");
			
			// Calculamos dinámicamente la altura del menú fijo:
			var fromTop = jQuery('#content_list').height() + 10;
			
			// restamos el height del content_list en el caso de que no esté affixed
			var extraHeight = jQuery("#content_list.affix").length == 0 ? jQuery("#content_list").height() : 0;

			// If our Href points to a valid, non-empty anchor, and is on the same page (e.g. #foo)
			if(href.indexOf("#") == 0) {
				var $target = jQuery(href);
				if($target.length) {
					jQuery('html, body').animate({ scrollTop: $target.offset().top - fromTop - extraHeight });
					if(history && "pushState" in history) {
						history.pushState({}, document.title, window.location.pathname + href);
						return false;
					}
				}
			}
		}
		jQuery(document).ready(function() {
			jQuery('#content_list').on("click", "a", scroll_if_anchor);
		});

			jQuery(document).ready(function() {
				var totalItems = jQuery('.item').length;
				var currentIndex = jQuery('div.active').index() + 1;
				jQuery('.slideNum').html(''+currentIndex+'/'+totalItems+'');

				jQuery('#headerBigImage').on('slid.bs.carousel', function () {
					currentIndex = jQuery('div.active').index() + 1;
				   jQuery('.slideNum').html(''+currentIndex+'/'+totalItems+'');
				});
			});

						function initAffix() {
							jQuery('#content_list').affix({
								offset: {
									top: function() { 			
										return jQuery('.topHeaderWrap').offset().top + jQuery('.topHeaderWrap').height()
									}
								}
							});
						}

				function printing() {
					printWindow = window.open( '', 'Print','width=900,height=500,left=50,top=100, menubar=0,toolbar=0,status=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=0,titlebar=0' );

	        		printWindow.document.write( '<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01//EN">' );
					printWindow.document.write( '<html>');
					printWindow.document.write( '<head>');
		 printWindow.document.write( '<link rel="stylesheet" href="http://www.languagecourse.net/templates/default/css/print.20100517115428.css.php">'); 
					printWindow.document.write( '</head>');
					printWindow.document.write( '<body>');
	   	    		printWindow.document.write( ( document.getElementById( "course_calculator" ).innerHTML ) );
	       			printWindow.document.write( '</body>' );
	        		printWindow.document.write( '</html>' );
	   	   			printWindow.print();
	    	    }

	    	    function toggleDates() {
	    	    	toggle( "starting_date" );
	    	    	if ( $( "accomodation_type_description" ).value != 0 ) {
	    	    		$( "rental_dates" ).className = $( "starting_date" ).className ;
	    	    	}
	    	    	//adjustAll();
	    	    }

	    	    function forceOpenDates() {
	    	    	var obj = document.getElementById( "starting_date" );
					if ( obj.className.indexOf('show_row') == -1 ) {
						toggleDates();
					}
	    	    }
			',

	   FB.ui({
            method: 'send',
            link: "https://www.languagecourse.net/school-planete-langues-institut-international-rambouillet.php3",
			app_id: 116758038455507
        })
	});

a.sliderY=(b.offsetY||b.originalEvent.layerY)-.5*a.sliderHeight,a.scroll(),a.events.down(b),!1}}(this),scroll:function(a){return function(b){a.updateScrollValues(),a.isBeingDragged||(a.iOSNativeScrolling||(a.sliderY=a.sliderTop,a.setOnScrollStyles()),null!=b&&(a.contentScrollTop>=a.maxScrollTop?(a.options.preventPageScrolling&&a.preventScrolling(b,g),a.prevScrollTop!==a.maxScrollTop&&a.$el.trigger("scrollend")):0===a.contentScrollTop&&(a.options.preventPageScrolling&&a.preventScrolling(b,w),0!==a.prevScrollTop&&a.$el.trigger("scrolltop"))))}}(this),wheel:function(a){return function(b){var c;if(null!=b)return c=b.delta||b.wheelDelta||b.originalEvent&&b.originalEvent.wheelDelta||-b.detail||b.originalEvent&&-b.originalEvent.detail,c&&(a.sliderY+=-c/3),a.scroll(),!1}}(this),enter:function(a){return function(b){var c;if(a.isBeingDragged)return 1!==(b.buttons||b.which)?(c=a.events)[w].apply(c,arguments):void 0}}(this)}},j.prototype.addEvents=function(){var a;this.removeEvents(),a=this.events,this.options.disableResize||this.win.bind(s,a[s]),this.iOSNativeScrolling||(this.slider.bind(l,a[g]),this.pane.bind(l,a[r]).bind(""+p+" "+f,a[x])),this.$content.bind(""+t+" "+p+" "+f+" "+v,a[t])},j.prototype.removeEvents=function(){var a;a=this.events,this.win.unbind(s,a[s]),this.iOSNativeScrolling||(this.slider.unbind(),this.pane.unbind()),this.$content.unbind(""+t+" "+p+" "+f+" "+v,a[t])},j.prototype.generate=function(){var a,c,d,f,g,h,i;return f=this.options,h=f.paneClass,i=f.sliderClass,a=f.contentClass,(g=this.$el.children("."+h)).length||g.children("."+i).length||this.$el.append('<div class="'+h+'"><div class="'+i+'" /></div>'),this.pane=this.$el.children("."+h),this.slider=this.pane.find("."+i),0===e&&C()?(d=b.getComputedStyle(this.content,null).getPropertyValue("padding-right").replace(/[^0-9.]+/g,""),c={right:-14,paddingRight:+d+14}):e&&(c={right:-e},this.$el.addClass(f.enabledClass)),null!=c&&this.$content.css(c),this},j.prototype.restore=function(){this.stopped=!1,this.iOSNativeScrolling||this.pane.show(),this.addEvents()},j.prototype.reset=function(){var a,b,c,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n;return this.iOSNativeScrolling?void(this.contentHeight=this.content.scrollHeight):(this.$el.find("."+this.options.paneClass).length||this.generate().stop(),this.stopped&&this.restore(),a=this.content,f=a.style,g=f.overflowY,d&&this.$content.css({height:this.$content.height()}),b=a.scrollHeight+e,l=parseInt(this.$el.css("max-height"),10),l>0&&(this.$el.height(""),this.$el.height(a.scrollHeight>l?l:a.scrollHeight)),i=this.pane.outerHeight(!1),k=parseInt(this.pane.css("top"),10),h=parseInt(this.pane.css("bottom"),10),j=i+k+h,n=Math.round(j/b*i),n<this.options.sliderMinHeight?n=this.options.sliderMinHeight:null!=this.options.sliderMaxHeight&&n>this.options.sliderMaxHeight&&(n=this.options.sliderMaxHeight),g===t&&f.overflowX!==t&&(n+=e),this.maxSliderTop=j-n,this.contentHeight=b,this.paneHeight=i,this.paneOuterHeight=j,this.sliderHeight=n,this.paneTop=k,this.slider.height(n),this.events.scroll(),this.pane.show(),this.isActive=!0,a.scrollHeight===a.clientHeight||this.pane.outerHeight(!0)>=a.scrollHeight&&g!==t?(this.pane.hide(),this.isActive=!1):this.el.clientHeight===a.scrollHeight&&g===t?this.slider.hide():this.slider.show(),this.pane.css({opacity:this.options.alwaysVisible?1:"",visibility:this.options.alwaysVisible?"visible":""}),c=this.$content.css("position"),("static"===c||"relative"===c)&&(m=parseInt(this.$content.css("right"),10),m&&this.$content.css({right:"",marginRight:m})),this)},j.prototype.scroll=function(){return this.isActive?(this.sliderY=Math.max(0,this.sliderY),this.sliderY=Math.min(this.maxSliderTop,this.sliderY),this.$content.scrollTop(this.maxScrollTop*this.sliderY/this.maxSliderTop),this.iOSNativeScrolling||(this.updateScrollValues(),this.setOnScrollStyles()),this):void 0},j.prototype.scrollBottom=function(a){return this.isActive?(this.$content.scrollTop(this.contentHeight-this.$content.height()-a).trigger(p),this.stop().restore(),this):void 0},j.prototype.scrollTop=function(a){return this.isActive?(this.$content.scrollTop(+a).trigger(p),this.stop().restore(),this):void 0},j.prototype.scrollTo=function(a){return this.isActive?(this.scrollTop(this.$el.find(a).get(0).offsetTop),this):void 0},j.prototype.stop=function(){return y&&this.scrollRAF&&(y(this.scrollRAF),this.scrollRAF=null),this.stopped=!0,this.removeEvents(),this.iOSNativeScrolling||this.pane.hide(),this},j.prototype.destroy=function(){return this.stopped||this.stop(),!this.iOSNativeScrolling&&this.pane.length&&this.pane.remove(),d&&this.$content.height(""),this.$content.removeAttr("tabindex"),this.$el.hasClass(this.options.enabledClass)&&(this.$el.removeClass(this.options.enabledClass),this.$content.css({right:""})),this},j.prototype.flash=function(){return!this.iOSNativeScrolling&&this.isActive?(this.reset(),this.pane.addClass(this.options.flashedClass),setTimeout(function(a){return function(){a.pane.removeClass(a.options.flashedClass)}}(this),this.options.flashDelay),this):void 0},j}(),a.fn.nanoScroller=function(b){return this.each(function(){var c,d;if((d=this.nanoscroller)||(c=a.extend({},z,b),this.nanoscroller=d=new q(this,c)),b&&"object"==typeof b){if(a.extend(d.options,b),null!=b.scrollBottom)return d.scrollBottom(b.scrollBottom);if(null!=b.scrollTop)return d.scrollTop(b.scrollTop);if(b.scrollTo)return d.scrollTo(b.scrollTo);if("bottom"===b.scroll)return d.scrollBottom(0);if("top"===b.scroll)return d.scrollTop(0);if(b.scroll&&b.scroll instanceof a)return d.scrollTo(b.scroll);if(b.stop)return d.stop();if(b.destroy)return d.destroy();if(b.flash)return d.flash()}return d.reset()})},a.fn.nanoScroller.Constructor=q});
//# sourceMappingURL=jquery.nanoscroller.min.js.map

', 

', 

/******************************************************************************************************************************************************************************/
/*** Script para activar scroll en una parte del price calculator si la altura de la ventana no nos permite interactuar con el mismo a causa del position: fixed que tiene ***/
/****************************************************************************************************************************************************************************/

// llamamos la función en el window load para realizar las comprobaciones desde la carga
jQuery(window).load(function() {
	dynamicPriceCalculatorScroll();
});

// llamamos la función cuando el usuario cambia el tamaño de la ventana y también se llama en los siguientes archivos: 'classic_static_reduced.js' (para recalcular la altura una vez aparezca el botón de 'Check Availability') y en 'javascript.tpl' (para recalcular la altura en cada llamada de AJAX de los dropdowns del price calculator y que actualizará los valores y la altura del mismo)
jQuery(window).on('resize', function() {
	dynamicPriceCalculatorScroll();
});

function dynamicPriceCalculatorScroll() {	

	// altura de la ventana del navegador (solo la parte visible de la misma)
	var windowHeight = window.innerHeight;
	
	var windowWidth = window.innerWidth;
	
	// usamos 'outerHeight' porque incluye paddings y borders
	var calcTitleHeight = jQuery('.priceCalcTitle').outerHeight();
	
	// en este caso usaremos el 'scrollHeight' que nos dará un valor más real para cualndo el cálculo que se realize sobre este elemento contenga partes ocultadas y scroll: "scrollHeight: is a measurement of the height of an element's content including content not visible on the screen due to overflow"
	var dynamicScrollableWrap = jQuery('.dynamicScrollableWrap')[0].scrollHeight;
	
	// usamos 'outerHeight' porque incluye paddings y borders
	var bottomAlwaysVisiblePart = jQuery('.bottomAlwaysVisiblePart').outerHeight();
	
	// calculamos las variables necesarias...
	var courseCalcHeight = calcTitleHeight + dynamicScrollableWrap + bottomAlwaysVisiblePart;
	
	// ... y el valor que añadiremos de 'max-height' en el condicional de abajo (también añadiremos el scroll obviamente)
	var y = windowHeight - (calcTitleHeight + bottomAlwaysVisiblePart) ;

	if( courseCalcHeight > windowHeight && windowWidth >= 600 ) {
		jQuery('.dynamicScrollableWrap').css({"max-height": y});
		jQuery('.dynamicScrollableWrap').css('overflow-y','scroll');
	
		// hago desaparecer los tooltips de la parte escrollable para evitar que aparezca scroll horizontal y comportamientos extraños
		//jQuery('.dynamicScrollableWrap .whiteToolTip').css('display','none');
		
		// colocar el nanoScroller en la parte del price calculator que nos interesa scrollear
		// llamar al nanoScroller.js: http://jamesflorentino.github.io/nanoScrollerJS/
		jQuery(".nano").nanoScroller({ alwaysVisible: true });
		// añade la clase que permite estilar el nanoScroller
		jQuery('.nanoScrollerPlaceHolder').addClass("nano");
		// para recuperar el height de la caja y que no quede todo ocultado
		jQuery('.nanoScrollerPlaceHolder').css({"height": y});
		// elimina la clase que contiene el margen correcto para que se coloque el margen necesario para la cabida del nanoScroller
		jQuery('.nano-content').removeClass("nanoNoMargin");
		
	} else {
	
		jQuery('.dynamicScrollableWrap').css('max-height', 'none');
		jQuery('.dynamicScrollableWrap').css('overflow-y','visible');
		//jQuery('.dynamicScrollableWrap .whiteToolTip').css('display','inline-block');
		
		// eliminar el nanoScroller
		jQuery(".nano").nanoScroller({ destroy: true });
		// eliminar la clase del nanoScroller para que no se nos cierre la caja
		jQuery('.nanoScrollerPlaceHolder').removeClass("nano");
		// añade la clase que coloca el margen correcto al contenido
		jQuery('.nano-content').addClass("nanoNoMargin");
		// eliminar el height anterior para que la caja abra mostrando todo su contenido correctamente
		jQuery('.nanoScrollerPlaceHolder').css('height', 'auto');
	}
	
	// Aquí eliminamos los enlaces de las imágenes que abren el lightbox
	if (windowWidth <= 1030) {
		jQuery(".photosSmallInternal a[onclick], .photosBigInternal a[onclick]").each(function(i, lb_item) {
			jQuery(lb_item).attr("onclick_fake", jQuery(lb_item).attr("onclick"));
			jQuery(lb_item).removeAttr("onclick");
		});
	} else {
		jQuery(".photosSmallInternal a[onclick_fake], .photosBigInternal a[onclick_fake]").each(function(i, lb_item) {
			jQuery(lb_item).attr("onclick", jQuery(lb_item).attr("onclick_fake"));
			jQuery(lb_item).removeAttr("onclick_fake");
		});
	}
}

',

						', 
					', 
					', 
						', 
						', 
							', 
							', +', 
						', 
					', 

																				', 
						', Includes high season supplement', 
						', 
						',  ', 
						',

							', 
						', 
					', 
					
																				', 
', 
	',

			', Starting date',

', 
', 
	
	function calendarInit(){
		var start_day = document.getElementById('start_day').value;
		var start_month = document.getElementById('start_month').value;
		var start_year = document.getElementById('start_year').value;
		var calendar_date = jQuery("#calendarDatePicker1").data("datepicker").getFormattedDate('dd-mm-yyyy');
		if (calendar_date == '' && start_day != "" && start_month != "" && start_year != "") {
			var d = new Date(start_year, start_month-1, start_day);
			jQuery('#calendarDatePicker1').datepicker("update", d);
		}
		datepickerInitialPlacement('calendarDatePicker1');
	}
	function calendarChanged(first_time){
		var ind = document.getElementById('calendarIndicator');
		var calendar_date = jQuery("#calendarDatePicker1").data("datepicker").getFormattedDate('dd-mm-yyyy');
		if (calendar_date == '') {
			ind.innerHTML = '+';
			ind.className = ind.className.replace( "calNumFilled", "calNumEmpty" );
			jQuery('#calendar_date_intro').removeClass('calendarHideIntro').addClass('calendarShowIntro');
			jQuery('#calendar_date').attr('size','1');
			jQuery('#calendar_date').css('width','0');
		}
		else {
			var date = calendar_date.split('-');
			ind.innerHTML = date[0];
			ind.className = ind.className.replace( "calNumEmpty", "calNumFilled" );
			jQuery('#calendar_date_intro').removeClass('calendarShowIntro').addClass('calendarHideIntro');
			jQuery('#calendar_date').attr('size','9');
			jQuery('#calendar_date').css('width','');
			document.getElementById('start_day').value = date[0];
			document.getElementById('start_month').value = date[1];
			document.getElementById('start_year').value = date[2];
			if (!first_time)
				adjustAccommdationDate();
			onChangeApplicationForm();
			showFreeCancel();
			showAvailability();
		}
		replicateValue('calendar_date');
		replicateValue('calendar_ind');
		datepickerInitialPlacement('calendarDatePicker1');
	}

		function calendarInit2(){
			var first_day = document.getElementById('first_day').value;
			var first_month = document.getElementById('first_month').value;
			var first_year = document.getElementById('first_year').value;
			var calendar_date = jQuery("#calendarDatePicker2").data("datepicker").getFormattedDate('dd-mm-yyyy');
			if (calendar_date == '' && first_day != "" && first_month != "" && first_year != "") {
				var d = new Date(first_year, first_month-1, first_day);
				jQuery('#calendarDatePicker2').datepicker("update", d);
			}
			datepickerInitialPlacement('calendarDatePicker2');
		}
		function calendarChanged2(){
			var ind = document.getElementById('calendarIndicator2');
			var calendar_date = jQuery("#calendarDatePicker2").data("datepicker").getFormattedDate('dd-mm-yyyy');
			if (calendar_date == '') {
				ind.innerHTML = '+';
				ind.className = ind.className.replace( "calNumFilled", "calNumEmpty" );
				jQuery('#calendar_date_intro2').removeClass('calendarHideIntro').addClass('calendarShowIntro');
				jQuery('#calendar_date2').hide();
				jQuery('#calendar_date2').attr('size','1');
				jQuery('#calendar_date2').css('width','0');
			}
			else {
				var date = calendar_date.split('-');
				ind.innerHTML = date[0];
				ind.className = ind.className.replace( "calNumEmpty", "calNumFilled" );
				jQuery('#calendar_date_intro2').removeClass('calendarShowIntro').addClass('calendarHideIntro');
				jQuery('#calendar_date2').show();
				jQuery('#calendar_date2').attr('size','9');
				jQuery('#calendar_date2').css('width','');
				document.getElementById('first_day').value = date[0];
				document.getElementById('first_month').value = date[1];
				document.getElementById('first_year').value = date[2];
				onChangeApplicationForm();
			}
			replicateValue('calendar_date2');
			replicateValue('calendar_ind2');
			datepickerInitialPlacement('calendarDatePicker2');
		}

		function calendarInit3(){
			var last_day = document.getElementById('last_day').value;
			var last_month = document.getElementById('last_month').value;
			var last_year = document.getElementById('last_year').value;
			var calendar_date = jQuery("#calendarDatePicker3").data("datepicker").getFormattedDate('dd-mm-yyyy');
			if (calendar_date == '' && last_day != "" && last_month != "" && last_year != "") {
				var d = new Date(last_year, last_month-1, last_day);
				jQuery('#calendarDatePicker3').datepicker("update", d);
			}
			datepickerInitialPlacement('calendarDatePicker3');
		}
		function calendarChanged3(){
			var ind = document.getElementById('calendarIndicator3');
			var calendar_date = jQuery("#calendarDatePicker3").data("datepicker").getFormattedDate('dd-mm-yyyy');
			if (calendar_date == '') {
				ind.innerHTML = '+';
				ind.className = ind.className.replace( "calNumFilled", "calNumEmpty" );
				jQuery('#calendar_date_intro3').removeClass('calendarHideIntro').addClass('calendarShowIntro');
				jQuery('#calendar_date3').hide();
				jQuery('#calendar_date3').attr('size','1');
				jQuery('#calendar_date3').css('width','0');
			}
			else {
				var date = calendar_date.split('-');
				ind.innerHTML = date[0];
				ind.className = ind.className.replace( "calNumEmpty", "calNumFilled" );
				jQuery('#calendar_date_intro3').removeClass('calendarShowIntro').addClass('calendarHideIntro');
				jQuery('#calendar_date3').show();
				jQuery('#calendar_date3').attr('size','9');
				jQuery('#calendar_date3').css('width','');
				document.getElementById('last_day').value = date[0];
				document.getElementById('last_month').value = date[1];
				document.getElementById('last_year').value = date[2];
				onChangeApplicationForm();
			}
			replicateValue('calendar_date3');
			replicateValue('calendar_ind3');
			datepickerInitialPlacement('calendarDatePicker3');
		}

    function prCalc_updateCourseDuration(duration) {
        var weeks = document.getElementById('number_weeks'); 
        var weeks_val = document.getElementById('duration_sel'); 
        weeks.value = duration; 
        weeks_val.innerHTML = duration;
    }
    function replicateValue(id) {
    	dest = document.getElementById(id + '_copy');
    	source = document.getElementById(id);
    	var value;
    	if (source.tagName.toLowerCase() == 'input' && source.getAttribute("type") == 'text')
			value = source.value;
		else
			value = source.innerHTML;
    	if (dest) {
    		if (dest.tagName.toLowerCase() == 'input' && dest.getAttribute("type") == 'text')
    			dest.value = value;
    		else
    			dest.innerHTML = value;
    	}
    }
    function datepickerChangePlacement(id_old, id_new){
    	var elem = document.getElementById(id_new);
    	if (elem) {
    		var search = "#" + id_old + " .datepicker";
    		var cssSave = document.getElementById(id_old + "_css");
    		if (cssSave.value == '')
    			cssSave.value  = jQuery(search).attr('style');
    		var boundaries = elem.getBoundingClientRect();
			jQuery(search).css({ position: 'fixed', top: boundaries.bottom +8, left: boundaries.left -10});
			jQuery("#" + id_new).onPositionChanged(function(){datepickerAdjustPlacement(id_old, id_new)});
		}
    }
    function datepickerAdjustPlacement(id_old, id_new) {
    	var elem = document.getElementById(id_new);
   		var cssSave = document.getElementById(id_old + "_css");
   		var picker = jQuery("#" + id_old + " .datepicker");
    	if (elem && cssSave && cssSave.value !='' && picker != null && picker.length > 0) {
    		var boundaries = elem.getBoundingClientRect();
			picker.css({ position: 'fixed', top: boundaries.bottom +8, left: boundaries.left -10});
    	}

    }
    function datepickerInitialPlacement(id_old){
    	var cssSave = document.getElementById(id_old + "_css");
    	var search = "#" + id_old + " .datepicker";
    	if (cssSave && cssSave.value != '') {
	    	jQuery(search).attr('style',cssSave.value);
	    	cssSave.value ='';
    	}
    }
	jQuery.fn.onPositionChanged = function (trigger, millis) {
	    if (millis == null) millis = 100;
	    var o = this[0]; 
	    if (o.length < 1) return o;

	    var lastBoundaries = null;
	    setInterval(function () {
	        if (o == null || o.length < 1) return o; // abort if element is non existend eny more
	        if (lastBoundaries == null) lastBoundaries = o.getBoundingClientRect();
	        var newBoundaries = o.getBoundingClientRect();
	        if (lastBoundaries.top != newBoundaries.top || lastBoundaries.left != newBoundaries.left) {
	            jQuery(o).trigger('onPositionChanged', { lastBoundaries: lastBoundaries, newBoundaries: newBoundaries });
	            if (typeof (trigger) == "function") trigger(lastBoundaries, newBoundaries);
	            lastBoundaries = o.getBoundingClientRect();
	        }
	    }, millis);

	    return o;
	};
	document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function()  {
		
					var cookie_course = readCookie('s' + $("school_id").value + '_c');
			var cookie_accommo = readCookie('s' + $("school_id").value + '_a');
							if (cookie_course != null && parseInt(cookie_course) > 0 && jQuery("#course_"+ cookie_course).text() != '') {
					$("id_course").value = cookie_course;
					$("id_course_selector").innerHTML = jQuery("#course_"+ cookie_course).text();
				}
				else
					jQuery('#id_course_selector_list li:first a:first').click();
						if (cookie_accommo != null && parseInt(cookie_accommo) > 0 && jQuery("#acco_"+ cookie_accommo).text() != '') {
				jQuery("#accomodation_type_description option[value='" + cookie_accommo + "']").prop('selected',true);
				$("id_accommodation_selector").innerHTML = jQuery("#acco_"+ cookie_accommo).text();
				if (document.getElementById('first_day').value == '' || document.getElementById('last_day').value == '')
					adjustAccommdationDate();
			}
			showFreeCancel();
			showAvailability();
				

		if (($("id_course").value > 0 || ($("p_accommodation_type_description").value != "" && $("p_accommodation_type_description").value > 0))) {
			calendarInit();	calendarChanged(1);
			calendarInit2(); calendarChanged2();
			calendarInit3(); calendarChanged3();
			onChangeApplicationForm();
		}
		replicateValue('id_course_selector');
		replicateValue('id_course_selector_list');
		replicateValue('id_accommodation_selector');
		replicateValue('id_accommodation_selector_list');
		replicateValue('airport_transfer_sel');
		replicateValue('id_airport_transfer_sel_list');
		
				
	});

	document.addEventListener('resize', function(){
		datepickerAdjustPlacement('calendarDatePicker1','datepicker_date_copy');
		datepickerAdjustPlacement('calendarDatePicker2','datepicker_date2_copy');
		datepickerAdjustPlacement('calendarDatePicker3','datepicker_date3_copy');
	});

	function makeCalculatorEditable(field) {
		if (window.innerWidth < 600) /* scroll to the top in movile to be sure calculator is displayed */ 
			window.scrollTo(0,150);
		jQuery('#' + field).addClass("remark_field");
		jQuery('#footer').css('z-index', -2);
		jQuery('#calculator_title').show();
		jQuery('body').removeClass('readOnlyCalc');
		jQuery('#content_panel').addClass('divsToDim');
		jQuery('#dropWeeks a[data-toggle]')[0].setAttribute('data-toggle','dropdown');
		jQuery('#dropCourses a[data-toggle]')[0].setAttribute('data-toggle','dropdown');
		jQuery('#dropAccommo a[data-toggle]')[0].setAttribute('data-toggle','dropdown');
		jQuery('#dropLessons a[data-toggle]')[0].setAttribute('data-toggle','dropdown');
		jQuery('#dropAirport a[data-toggle]')[0].setAttribute('data-toggle','dropdown');
		//jQuery('#availabilityPriceCalc').show();
		jQuery('#starting_date_notice').show();
		jQuery('#not_available_dates').show();
		jQuery('#publishedPriceOfAccommodationDisplay').show();
		jQuery('#accomm_not_available_dates').show();
		//jQuery('#course_available').show();
		//jQuery('#check_availability_btn').show();
		jQuery('#calendarDatePicker1').data("datepicker").o.enableOnReadonly = true;
		jQuery('#calendarDatePicker2').data("datepicker").o.enableOnReadonly = true;
		jQuery('#calendarDatePicker3').data("datepicker").o.enableOnReadonly = true;
		jQuery('#calculator_readonly').val(0);
		showAvailability();
		jQuery('#calc_edit_btn').hide();
		jQuery('#calc_save_btn').show();
	}
	function makeCalculatorReadonly() {
		jQuery('#footer').css('z-index', 0);
		jQuery('#calculator_title').hide();
		jQuery('body').addClass('readOnlyCalc');
		jQuery('#content_panel').removeClass('divsToDim');
		jQuery('#dropWeeks a[data-toggle]')[0].setAttribute('data-toggle','dropdown disabled');
		jQuery('#dropCourses a[data-toggle]')[0].setAttribute('data-toggle','dropdown disabled');
		jQuery('#dropAccommo a[data-toggle]')[0].setAttribute('data-toggle','dropdown disabled');
		jQuery('#dropLessons a[data-toggle]')[0].setAttribute('data-toggle','dropdown disabled');
		jQuery('#dropAirport a[data-toggle]')[0].setAttribute('data-toggle','dropdown disabled');
		jQuery('#availabilityPriceCalc').hide();
		jQuery('#starting_date_notice').hide();
		jQuery('#not_available_dates').hide();
		jQuery('#publishedPriceOfAccommodationDisplay').hide();
		jQuery('#accomm_not_available_dates').hide();
		jQuery('#course_available').hide();
		jQuery('#check_availability_btn').hide();
		jQuery('#calendarDatePicker1').data("datepicker").o.enableOnReadonly = false;
		jQuery('#calendarDatePicker2').data("datepicker").o.enableOnReadonly = false;
		jQuery('#calendarDatePicker3').data("datepicker").o.enableOnReadonly = false;
		jQuery('#calculator_readonly').val(1);
		//jQuery('#calc_edit_btn').show();
		jQuery('#calc_save_btn').hide();
	}
	function showRegistrationInfo() {

		function display_price(price) {
			var res = number_format(price, 2, ",", "." );
			if (res.substr(-3) == ',00')
				res = res.substr(0, res.length-3);
			return res;
		}
		
		// Course
		jQuery('#duration_sel').html('');
		jQuery('#id_course_selector').html(' ( lessons per week)');
				jQuery('#summary_course_p').show().html('+');
		jQuery('#summary_course').html(display_price('') + '  ');
		var calendar_date = "";
		var date = calendar_date.split('-');
		var d = new Date(date[0], date[1]-1, date[2]);
		jQuery('#calendarDatePicker1').datepicker("update", d);
						
		// Accommodation
		jQuery('#id_accommodation_selector').html('');
		
		// Private lessons and airport transfer
		jQuery('#indiv_lesson_sel').html(' ' + 'lessons');
				
		// Totals and insurance
				jQuery('#summary_total').html(display_price('') + ' ');
		       	jQuery('#benefit_prepayment').show();
		jQuery('#summary_prepayment').html(display_price('') + ' ');
				
	}
	function number_format( number, decimals, dec_point, thousands_sep ) {
	    // http://kevin.vanzonneveld.net
	    // +   original by: Jonas Raoni Soares Silva (http://www.jsfromhell.com)
	    // +   improved by: Kevin van Zonneveld (http://kevin.vanzonneveld.net)
	    // +     bugfix by: Michael White (http://getsprink.com)
	    // +     bugfix by: Benjamin Lupton
	    // +     bugfix by: Allan Jensen (http://www.winternet.no)
	    // +    revised by: Jonas Raoni Soares Silva (http://www.jsfromhell.com)
	    // +     bugfix by: Howard Yeend
	    // +    revised by: Luke Smith (http://lucassmith.name)
	    // +     bugfix by: Diogo Resende
	    // +     bugfix by: Rival
	    // %        note 1: For 1000.55 result with precision 1 in FF/Opera is 1,000.5, but in IE is 1,000.6
	    // *     example 1: number_format(1234.56);
	    // *     returns 1: '1,235'
	    // *     example 2: number_format(1234.56, 2, ',', ' ');
	    // *     returns 2: '1 234,56'
	    // *     example 3: number_format(1234.5678, 2, '.', '');
	    // *     returns 3: '1234.57'
	    // *     example 4: number_format(67, 2, ',', '.');
	    // *     returns 4: '67,00'
	    // *     example 5: number_format(1000);
	    // *     returns 5: '1,000'
	    // *     example 6: number_format(67.311, 2);
	    // *     returns 6: '67.31'
	 
	    var n = number, prec = decimals;
	    n = !isFinite(+n) ? 0 : +n;
	    prec = !isFinite(+prec) ? 0 : Math.abs(prec);
	    var sep = (typeof thousands_sep == "undefined") ? ',' : thousands_sep;
	    var dec = (typeof dec_point == "undefined") ? '.' : dec_point;
	 
	    var s = (prec > 0) ? n.toFixed(prec) : Math.round(n).toFixed(prec); //fix for IE parseFloat(0.55).toFixed(0) = 0;
	 
	    var abs = Math.abs(n).toFixed(prec);
	    var _, i;
	 
	    if (abs >= 1000) {
	        _ = abs.split(/\D/);
	        i = _[0].length % 3 || 3;
	 
	        _[0] = s.slice(0,i + (n < 0)) +
	              _[0].slice(i).replace(/(\d{3})/g, sep+'$1');
	 
	        s = _.join(dec);
	    } else {
	        s = s.replace('.', dec);
	    }
	 
	    return s;
	}	
', 
 ',  ',  ',  ',  ',  ',  ',  ',   ',  ',  ',  ',   ',  ',  ',  ',  ',  ',  ',  ', Secure your course today.',  ',  ',  ',  ',  ',  ',  ',   ',  ',  ',  ',  ',   ',  ',  ',  ',  ', Free Price Quote PDF', \uf0e0',  ',  ',  ', Receive a free price quote in PDF format, sent to your email account, for the course at ', Planete Langues-Institut International',  which you selected in the course price calculator.

			var last_float = null;
	        function createMarker(map, point, nombre) {
		    	 var image = '/templates/default/img/school-marker.png'; 
				var properties = {position: point, icon: image}
	            var marker = new google.maps.Marker(properties);
	            /*GEvent.addListener(marker, 'mouseover', function() {
	                            marker.openInfoWindowHtml(nombre);
	            });*/
	            google.maps.event.addListener(marker, 'mouseover', function() {
	                            //marker.openInfoWindowHtml(nombre);
	                            var info = new google.maps.InfoWindow({content: nombre});
	                            if (last_float)
	                            	last_float.close();
	                            info.open(map, marker);
	                            last_float = info;
	                        });
	            return marker;
	        }
			function loadMap() {
				//google.load("maps", "2.x", {"callback" : activateMap});
				activateMap();
			}

			var activar=true;
		    function activateMap() {


				if (activar==true){
					document.getElementById("loading").style.display="block";


					setTimeout("document.getElementById('loading').style.display='none';",1000);
					var map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById("school_map"));
					var point = new google.maps.LatLng(mapCenter[0], mapCenter[1]);
					map.setCenter(point);
					map.setZoom(12);


	                var marker = createMarker (map, point, 'Planete Langues-Institut International<br> 48 rue Gosselin Lenotre');
	                marker.setMap(map);
					activar=false;
					document.getElementById("school_map").style.backgroundImage="";
				}
			}

			function displayCoursePrices(year, course_id) {
				var year2 = (year=='current'?'next':'current');
				var course_t = document.getElementById('tprices_' + year + '_' + course_id);
				var course_t2 = document.getElementById('tprices_' + year2 + '_' + course_id);
				var link = document.getElementById('link_prices_' + year + '_' + course_id);
				var link2 = document.getElementById('link_prices_' + year2 + '_' + course_id);
				course_t.style.display = 'block';
				course_t2.style.display = 'none';
				link.className = link.className.replace( "tabPricesNoAct", "tabPricesAct" );
				link2.className = link2.className.replace( "tabPricesAct", "tabPricesNoAct" );
			}

			function displayAccommoPrices(year, accommo_id) {

			}

		 ',  ',  function resetPriceCalcCookies() { document.cookie = 'start_date' + '=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:01 GMT;path=/'; document.cookie = 's1316_c' + '=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:01 GMT;path=/'; document.cookie = 's1316_a' + '=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:01 GMT;path=/'; document.location.reload(); } 
			function getCookie(cname) {
			    var name = cname + "=";
			    var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
			    for(var i=0; i<ca.length; i++) {
			        var c = ca[i];
			        while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1);
			        if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
			    }
			    return "";
			}
			document.addEvent('domready', function()  {
				var duration = getCookie('duration');
				if (duration != '') {
					prCalc_updateCourseDuration(duration);
				}
			});

// Beginning of old file common.light.js

function emptySelect(oSelect){
	for(i=oSelect.length-1; i>=0; i--)
        oSelect.options[i] = null;
};
function isNumeric(sText)
{
	if (typeof sText == 'undefined' || typeof sText == 'function') {
		return true;
	}else{
		var validChars = '0123456789.';
		var isNumber;
		var Char;
		if(sText!=''){
			isNumber=true;
			for (i = 0; i < sText.length && isNumber == true; i++){
				Char = sText.charAt(i);
	    		if (validChars.indexOf(Char) == -1){
	         		isNumber = false;
	         	}
	      	}
		}else{
			isNumber = false;
		}
		return isNumber;
	}
};
function strDec(text)
{
	var chars = text.split(/&#(?!(\s))|;/g);
	var result='';
	if (chars[0] != text){
		for(var i in chars)
			if (isNumeric(chars[i])) {
				result = result + String.fromCharCode(chars[i]);
			 } else {
			 	if (chars[i]!=''){
			 		result = result + chars[i];
			 	}
			 }
		return result;
	}else{
		return chars[0];
	}
};
function addLoadEvent(func)
{
  var oldonload = window.onload;
  if (typeof window.onload != 'function') {
    window.onload = func;
  } else {
    window.onload = function() {
      if (oldonload) {
        oldonload();
      }
      func();
    }
  }
}
function MM_openBrWindow(theURL,winName,features)
{
	window.open(theURL,winName,features);
}
function openPopup(Pfad)
{
	window.open(Pfad,"NextYearPrices","width=630,height=500,toolbar=no,location=no,scrollbars=yes");
}

function js_process_string(text){
	var chars = text.split(/&#(?!(\s))|;/g);
	var result='';
	if (chars[0]!=text){
		for(var i = 0; i < chars.length; ++i) {
			if (isNumeric(chars[i])) {
				result += String.fromCharCode(chars[i]);
			}
			else {
				result += chars[i];
			}
		}
		return result;
	}else{
		return chars[0];
	}
}
function stripslashes(str) {
	str = str.replace(/\'/g,'\'');
	str = str.replace(/\\\'/g,'\'');
	return str;
}
function ClearOptions(OptionList) {
   for (x = OptionList.length; x >= 0; x--) {
      OptionList[x] = null;
   }
}
function AddToOptionList(OptionList, OptionValue, OptionText) {
   OptionList[OptionList.length] = new Option(stripslashes(OptionText), OptionValue);
}
function AddToSelectorList(OptionList, OptionValue, OptionText, OptionTemplate) {
//	if (OptionValue>0){
		OptionList.innerHTML += OptionTemplate.replace(/replacetext/gi, OptionText).replace(/replacevalue/gi, OptionValue).replace(/replaceid/gi, OptionValue);
//	}else{
//		OptionList.innerHTML +=  OptionText+'<br>';
//	}
}
function GetTextToSelectorList(OptionValue, OptionText, OptionType, OptionTemplate) {
		return OptionTemplate.replace(/replacetext/gi, OptionText).replace(/replacevalue/gi, OptionValue).replace(/replaceid/gi, OptionType + OptionValue);
}
function out($url){
	MM_openBrWindow($url,'','');
}
function g(name){
	return document.getElementById(name);
}
function showhide(obj){
	if (obj.style.display == 'none'){
		obj.style.display = '';
	}else{
		obj.style.display = 'none';
	}
}
// End of former file common.light.js

// Beginning of former file querystring.js
function querystring()
{
	var temp = window.document.location.search.replace('?').split('&');
	var count = temp.length;
	var get = new Array();

	for (var i=0; i<count; i++){
		temp[i] = temp[i].split('=');

		get[temp[i][0]] = temp[i][1];
	}
	return get;
}

var get = new querystring();
// End of former file querystring.js

jQuery('#language_id_select').change(function() {
    jQuery('#country_select').change();
});
jQuery('#country_select').change(function() {
        jQuery('#city_select').change();
});
//


	// Beginning of the former js/searchbox.light.js
	function searchbox() {

	}

	searchbox.prototype.init = function(pQueryString, pLanguage_id, pCountry, pCity, pForceGet)
	{
		this.language_id = pLanguage_id;
		this.country = pCountry;
		this.city = pCity;
		this.querystring = pQueryString;
		var pForceGet = pForceGet || false;
		var actLanguage = '';
		var obj = this.language_id;
                    var firstdone = false;
		if (obj != null){
			if (obj.options != null) {
				obj.options[obj.length]= option_pick_language;
				for(i = 0; i<iLanguages.length; i++){
					if (iLanguages[i][0] != actLanguage && iLanguages[i][0] != '0'){
						actLanguage = iLanguages[i][0];
						if(i<180) 
							obj.options[obj.length] = new Option(actLanguage, langs[actLanguage]);
                        else {

                            if(!firstdone) {
                                var separator = new Option('---------------------------', null);
                                separator.disabled = 'disabled';
                                obj.options[obj.length] = separator;
                                firstdone = true;
                                i=0;
                                iLanguages.sort();
                            }
                            obj.options[obj.length] = new Option(actLanguage, langs[actLanguage]);
                        }
					}
				}
				if (this.querystring.language_id != undefined && pForceGet){
					this.language_id.value = parseInt(this.querystring.language_id);
					this.selectLanguage(parseInt(this.querystring.language_id), pForceGet);
				} else {
					this.selectLanguage(obj.value, pForceGet);
				}
			}
		}
	}

	searchbox.prototype.selectLanguage = function(pForceGet) {

		var pForceGet = pForceGet || false;
		var oCountry = this.country;
		if (this.querystring.language_id != undefined && pForceGet){
			pLang = this.querystring.language_id;
		} else {
			pLang = this.language_id.value;
		}
		document.getElementById( "country_select" ).disabled = ( pLang == -1 );
		this.emptySelect(oCountry);
		oCountry.options[oCountry.length]= option_pick_one_country;

		var actCountry = '';
		iLanguages.sort();
		for(i = 0; i<iLanguages.length; i++){
			if (langs[iLanguages[i][0]] == pLang && iLanguages[i][1] != actCountry){
				actCountry = iLanguages[i][1];
				oCountry.options[oCountry.length] = new Option(actCountry, actCountry);
			}
		}

                if(oCountry.length==2) {
                    document.getElementById( "country_select" ).disabled = true;
                    oCountry.options[0] = null;

                }

		if (this.querystring.country != undefined && pForceGet){
			this.country.value = this.querystring.country;
			this.selectCountry(this.querystring.country, pForceGet);
		} else {
			this.selectCountry(oCountry.value, pForceGet);
		}

	};

	searchbox.prototype.emptySelect = function (oSelect){

		if (oSelect){
			var max =oSelect.length-1;
			for(i=max; i>=0; i--){
	        	oSelect.options[i] = null;
	    	}
	    }
	};

	searchbox.prototype.selectCountry = function(pCountry, pForceGet) {
		var pForceGet = pForceGet || false;
		var oCity = this.city;
		if (this.querystring.language_id != undefined && pForceGet){
			pLang = this.querystring.language_id;
		} else {
			pLang = this.language_id.value;
		}
		if (pCountry == undefined){
			pCountry = this.country.value;
		}

		if (oCity){
			this.emptySelect(oCity);
			oCity.options[oCity.length] = option_pick_one_city;
			oCity.options[oCity.length] = option_all_cities;
			var actCity = '';
			if (pCountry == ''){
				for(i = 0; i<iLanguages.length; i++){
					if (langs[iLanguages[i][0]] == pLang && iLanguages[i][2] != actCity){
						actCity = iLanguages[i][2];
						oCity.options[oCity.length] = new Option(actCity, actCity);
					}
				}
			} else {
				for(i = 0; i<iLanguages.length; i++){
					if (iLanguages[i][1] == pCountry && iLanguages[i][2] != actCity && (iLanguages[i][0]!=-1 && langs[iLanguages[i][0]]==pLang)){
						actCity = iLanguages[i][2];
						oCity.options[oCity.length] = new Option(actCity, actCity);
					}
				}
			}
			if (this.querystring.city != undefined && pForceGet){
				this.city.value = this.querystring.city;
			}else{
				this.city.value = '';
			}
		}

	}

	searchbox.prototype.submit = function ()
	{
		if (this.country.value != '-1' && this.city.value != '-1'){
			return true;
		}
		//alert(searchbox_pick_one);
		return false;
	}

	var oSearchbox = new searchbox();
	// End of the former js/searchbox.light.js
	// Beginning of the former js/dump.js
	/**
	* Function : dump()
 	* Arguments: The data - array,hash(associative array),object
	*    The level - OPTIONAL
	* Returns  : The textual representation of the array.
	* This function was inspired by the print_r function of PHP.
	* This will accept some data as the argument and return a
	* text that will be a more readable version of the
	* array/hash/object that is given.
	* Docs: http://www.openjs.com/scripts/others/dump_function_php_print_r.php
	*/

	function dump(arr,level) {
		var dumped_text = "";
		if(!level) level = 0;

		var level_padding = "";
		for(var j=0;j<level+1;j++) level_padding += "    ";

		if(typeof(arr) == 'object') {
			for(var item in arr) {
				var value = arr[item];

				if(typeof(value) == 'object') {
					dumped_text += level_padding + "'" + item + "' ...\n";
					dumped_text += dump(value,level+1);
				} else {
					dumped_text += level_padding + "'" + item + "' => \"" + value + "\"\n";
				}
			}
		} else {
			dumped_text = "===>"+arr+"<===("+typeof(arr)+")";
		}
		return dumped_text;
	}
	// End of the former js/dump.js
	', 

	', 
	',

0495.jpg","imageThumbPath":"\/images\/schools\/thumbs\/planete-langues-institut-international-rambouillet_1380832390495.jpg","resolution":{"width":250,"height":191.5},"title":"","type":"image_map","class":""},{"thumbWidth":130,"thumbHeight":67.08,"thumbMarginLeft":-5,"thumbMarginTop":11.46,"imagePath":"\/images\/schools\/planete-langues-institut-international-rambouillet_1380832222988.jpg","imageThumbPath":"\/images\/schools\/thumbs\/planete-langues-institut-international-rambouillet_1380832222988.jpg","resolution":{"width":250,"height":129},"title":"","type":"image_map","class":""},{"thumbWidth":130,"thumbHeight":97.5,"thumbMarginLeft":-5,"thumbMarginTop":-3.75,"imagePath":"\/images\/schools\/planete-langues-institut-international-rambouillet_13808321741184.jpg","imageThumbPath":"\/images\/schools\/thumbs\/planete-langues-institut-international-rambouillet_13808321741184.jpg","resolution":{"width":250,"height":187.5},"title":"","type":"image_map","class":""},{"thumbWidth":130,"thumbHeight":99.84,"thumbMarginLeft":-5,"thumbMarginTop":-4.92,"imagePath":"\/images\/schools\/planete-langues-institut-international-rambouillet_1380832434233.jpg","imageThumbPath":"\/images\/schools\/thumbs\/planete-langues-institut-international-rambouillet_1380832434233.jpg","resolution":{"width":250,"height":192},"title":"","type":"image_map","class":""},{"thumbWidth":130,"thumbHeight":87.1,"thumbMarginLeft":-5,"thumbMarginTop":1.45,"imagePath":"\/images\/schools\/planete-langues-institut-international-rambouillet_1380832340165.jpg","imageThumbPath":"\/images\/schools\/thumbs\/planete-langues-institut-international-rambouillet_1380832340165.jpg","resolution":{"width":250,"height":167.5},"title":"","type":"image_map","class":""},{"thumbWidth":130,"thumbHeight":97.5,"thumbMarginLeft":-5,"thumbMarginTop":-3.75,"imagePath":"\/images\/schools\/planete-langues-institut-international-rambouillet_13808324631508.jpg","imageThumbPath":"\/images\/schools\/thumbs\/planete-langues-institut-internatio
